item.title: 香港 IPO 热潮掩盖了承销商收费率的大幅下降
item.description: 投资银行有望从香港上市承销费中分得多年来最小的一杯羹，尽管该市的股票销售已出现了迅猛反弹。【原文：Investment banks are on track to take home their smallest slice of underwriting fees from Hong Kong listings in years, even as share sales in the city have staged a blistering rebound.】

item.title: 日本推动企业改革，大宗交易创纪录
item.description: 日本股市正在经历一波创纪录的大宗私人交易浪潮，这些交易被称为大宗交易，源于公司为改善公司治理而减少交叉持股。【原文：Japan’s stock market is witnessing a record wave of large private transactions known as block trades, stemming from companies reducing cross-shareholdings to improve corporate governance.】

item.title: 策略师称美联储为亚洲市场带来 "金锁 "结果
item.description: 分析师认为，美联储会议的鹰派程度低于预期，将给亚洲各类资产市场带来一定程度的宽松。【原文：A less-hawkish than expected Federal Reserve meeting will bring a degree of relief to Asia’s markets across asset classes, according to analysts.】

item.title: 甲骨文发布财报后信用风险指数下降
item.description: 周三，甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）的信用风险指数连续第三天攀升，原因是这家数据库公司公布的数据中心和其他设备支出大幅增加，使人们对该公司能否迅速从人工智能领域的巨额投资中获利产生新的疑虑。【原文：A credit-risk measure for Oracle Corp. climbed for a third straight day on Wednesday after the database company posted a jump in spending on data centers and other equipment, raising fresh doubts about how quickly it can generate profit from its huge investments in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Lumexa Imaging 首次公开募股募集 4.625 亿美元，定价中档
item.description: Lumexa Imaging 控股公司在美国首次公开募股中募集了 4.625 亿美元，股票定价为市场范围的中间点。【原文：Lumexa Imaging Holdings Inc. raised $462.5 million in its US initial public offering, pricing shares at the mid-point of its marketed range.】

item.title: 市场综述：美联储降息提振情绪，亚洲股市将上涨
item.description: 美联储降息后，亚洲股市将呼应华尔街的涨势，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔乐观地表示，随着关税对通胀的影响被证明是暂时的，经济将走强。【原文：Asian equities were set to echo gains on Wall Street after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates and Chair Jerome Powell voiced optimism that the economy will strengthen as the inflationary impact from tariffs proves temporary.】

item.title: 美联储降息后美元创九月以来最差表现
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三强调了劳动力市场风险，同时淡化了对通胀的担忧，美元因此创下了近三个月来最糟糕的一天。【原文：The dollar posted its worst day in nearly three months after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell highlighted labor market risks while downplaying inflation concerns on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国航空公司与亚马逊洽谈 Leo 机上 Wi-Fi 计划
